alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and southeastern Sherman Counties through 515 PM MDT/615 PM CDT/... At 444 PM MDT/544 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Brewster, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph, torrential rainfall and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brewster. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 23 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/ for northwestern and west central Kansas.
